# Turn off emojis

I hate the emoji keyboard. I hit it easily with my fat fingers. I turned 
it off!

From [mashable.com](https://mashable.com/article/how-to-hide-memoji-imessage-keyboard/)

1. Open iMessage.
2. Click into a random conversation thread.
3. Swipe on the app icons until you see the bubble with three dots and then tap it.
4. Select "Edit"
5. Deselect "Memoji" from both the "FAVORITES" and the "MORE APPS" section.
6. Tap "Done"



# Turn off the Facebook auto-play video feature?

From [moneysavingexpert.com](http://www.moneysavingexpert.com/news/protect/2014/09/facebook-app-user-beware-big-bills-as-videos-automatically-play)

Go to your phone's settings

```
Settings > Facebook > Settings > Select 'Auto-play only on Wi-Fi', or 'Off'.
```
